text: 10.3 Lom 1.17, 9.30-32, Plp 3.9 God binɨb kɨlop gek, kɨli binɨb suŋtep ne yenɨgabal ak, anɨb ak kɨli gos ma nepal. Kɨli pen gos chɨn ke kɨdek gɨl, God binɨb suŋtep ne yonɨgun agɨl, gos anɨb ak nepal. Anɨb ak kɨli God gos ne ak kɨdek gɨl muk okok ma mɨdel, ne kɨlop gek binɨb suŋtep ne yenɨgel tek ma lup.
